definitions.definition: a man who controls prostitutes, especially by finding customers for them, and takes some of the money that they earn
to act as a pimp, getting customers for prostitutes; to provide someone to a customer as a prostitute :
examples: He spent most of his adult life pimping.

definitions.definition: to make something look fashionable or impressive, usually by adding things to it:
examples: He had pimped his truck with new lights and chrome accessories.
